issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Try to Install new software purchased via marketplace such as ForgedUI or try to download VIisualUI software. 
I receive the Error while reading â€¦. response. 
This happens with Titanium updates as well.  


h3. Actual Result
Error while reading from repository: http://updates.forgedui.com/update_site/site.xml.


h3. Expected Result
Expected to download correctly and appear in the Titanium Studio.
fields.summary: Install New Software does not work.

comments.body:
Hi,

Are you still having this issue? Can you please try the latest version of the TiSDK & the Module? If you continue to get this error, please send me the following -

1. test case you use
2. steps to reproduce it
3. screenshots if possible

Thanks,
